mapper.sql: id, adminname, adminbrief, createuserid, adminpic, admindetail, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rankcard where isdel='0'
AND adminname LIKE concat(concat('%',#{rankcard.adminname}),'%')
ORDER BY createtime DESC
limit #{startno},#{pagesize}

SELECT count(*) FROM rankcard WHERE 1=1
AND adminname LIKE concat(concat('%',#{adminname}),'%')
mapper.delete: UPDATE rankcard SET isdel='1' WHERE id= #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into rankcard (id, adminname, adminbrief, createuserid, adminpic, admindetail, createtime, updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admindetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into rankcard
id,
adminname,
adminbrief,
createuserid,
adminpic,
admindetail,
createtime,

mapper.update:
update rankcard
adminname = #{adminname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adminbrief = #{adminbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
adminpic = #{adminpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admindetail = #{admindetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update rankcard set adminname = #{adminname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adminbrief = #{adminbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adminpic = #{adminpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admindetail = #{admindetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
